abstract: Former British Open champion Stewart Cink will take break from golf to support his wife, who has breast cancer.
lead_paragraph: Stewart Cink, the British Open champion in 2009, said he was taking a break from golf after learning that his wife, Lisa, had breast cancer.
snippet: Stewart Cink, the British Open champion in 2009, said he was taking a break from golf after learning that his wife, Lisa, had breast cancer....
